creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
description: slightly grainy color photograph; woman seen from back, with her head turned to PR, wearing a black cloak off her PR shoulder, with its wide skirts flaring out to left and right; woman is standing on a pedestal (?) in front of a crumbling rust-colored wall, with fragments of colossal ancient sculptures around her--she is flanked by a colossal head on a tall pedestal to the left and a hand with an upraised index finger at right
title: Fragrance, Fendi
